metadata.title: Mason Jar Lifestyle Mirror/Chrome #4 Rust Proof Soap Pump Dispenser (Regular Mouth Threaded Lid Kit)
features: Mason Jar Lifestyle Mirror / Chrome #4 Soap Pump Dispenser Lid Kit for *Regular Mouth* Mason Jars.
Rust Proof - 304 Stainless Steel pump and lid will not rust. 6 month warranty.
Fits *Regular Mouth* Mason, Ball, Canning Jars - 2 3/8" Internal Diameter. Cut straw to fit your jar.
Just Add Jar and Soap - Kit includes everything else you need.
Multi Purpose - Dispense hand soap, dish soap, lotion, hand sanitizer, or liquid hair care products.
description: The kit comes with the plastic collar that attaches the lid to the pump and a 4 1/2″ tube (6 1/2″ protrusion into the jar including the part of the pump that sticks into the jar), which is the right length for a quart jar. For a pint jar, cut the tube to fit with a scissors.

Cut the tube short enough that it does not touch the bottom of your jar. If the tube is touching the bottom, the plastic collar will work its way off the bottom much more quickly. You can use a drop of super glue between the plastic collar and pump if you find the collar comes loose too often.
They are made of stainless steel and plastic. The threading is 28/400.

title: Mason Jar Lifestyle sells hundreds of accessories for jars!
Don't be nasty, wash your hands....
Assembly Tutorial of Mason Jar Pump and Lid

must have soap dispensers!
